titles.title: I HAVE MORE THAN A SONG

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v1 c1 b1 c1 b2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I have more than a song
Today, I brought myself
I am the sacrifice
I have more than a song
Today, I brought myself
I am Your Worship.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Receive this living sacrifice
I am Your Worship
Accept this living sacrifice
I am Your Worship

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
I am Your worship
I am Your Sacrifice
I am Your worship
I am Your Sacrifice

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
Leave me at the altar with my Father
Leave me at the altar with my Father
Leave me at the altar with my Father
Leave me at the altar with my Father
